Articles.Content:
Just a big thankyou out there for zpox357.!!!!

He told me to go back ot the store and i was able to download 0.17. HE WAS RIGHT. Just a big THANKU MAN!!!!!

Wow... ok man, maybe a new thread is just a bit too much, it wasn't too hard for me to type that reply.

Im glad too see it helped anyway, have a good time landing.

zpox357 was right, a thank you in the old thread would have been good enough, if you could do that in the future, that would be great. Glad to see you have 0.17 though, and thanks for helping him out zpox357.
